trends: There have been 22 other sightings in Columbus
There were no other sightings in Columbus on or around July 23rd 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsObjects were observed flying N.E. for approx.8 min. They maintained a separated distance in a triangle pattern and appeared to be gaining altitude. I got a pair of binoculars and the objects looked like pictures of the old sky hook balloons. I do not think these are in use any more. It was unusual that these maintained and equal distance from each other and were moving fast and climbing. I lost sight of them when they went behind a cloud. I noticed the objects as they reflected the sun and I was in front of my kitchen window. I just noticed the bright specks moving in a steady but peculiar formation so I went out to look. I had no fear or sense of anything extraordinary but the objects were not aircraft of any type I know of.
Summary: 3 objects flying n.e. Triangular pattern Looked like sky hook balloons
